docs.snippet: Chris Parmelee's three-run homer off left-handed reliever Jose Mijares broke open a close game in the sixth inning on Saturday, and the Minnesota Twins went on to beat the Boston Red Sox 6-2....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Parmelee's three-run homer off left-handed reliever Jose Mijares broke open a close game in the sixth inning on Saturday, and the Minnesota Twins went on to beat the Boston Red Sox 6-2.

headline.main: Parmelee's 3-Run HR Sends Twins Past Red Sox 6-2
headline.print_headline: Parmelee's 3-Run HR Sends Twins Past Red Sox 6-2

docs.snippet: The swirling snow came down in waves, dancing around the upper deck before eventually descending to the temporary ice rink in the middle of a football field....
docs.lead_paragraph: The swirling snow came down in waves, dancing around the upper deck before eventually descending to the temporary ice rink in the middle of a football field.

headline.main: Toews Powers Blackhawks to Snowy Win Over Penguins
headline.print_headline: Toews Powers Blackhawks to Snowy Win Over Penguins

docs.snippet: As gay rights have made great strides lately, why have abortion rights lost ground?...
docs.lead_paragraph: As gay rights have made great strides lately, why have abortion rights lost ground?
docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column questions why abortion rights movement has continued to lose ground, even as gay rights movement charts remarkable victories, citing Arizona as an example; contends conservatives feel safer restricting women's rights because outcome largely hurts poor people, representing a smaller political danger.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

docs.snippet: Newcastle United manager Alan Pardew was fined and warned by his club after he was sent off for headbutting a Hull City player while Chelsea and Liverpool claimed convincing away wins in the Premier League on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Newcastle United manager Alan Pardew was fined and warned by his club after he was sent off for headbutting a Hull City player while Chelsea and Liverpool claimed convincing away wins in the Premier League on Saturday.

headline.main: Pardew Sees Red, Chelsea and Liverpool March On
headline.print_headline: Pardew Sees Red, Chelsea and Liverpool March On

docs.snippet: It was nighttime in May of 1990, in the heyday of the cocaine boom across America. Twenty Mexican federal police officers and a handful of U.S. Customs agents, acting on a tip, descended on a stucco home on the edge of Agua Prieta, Mexico — ...
docs.lead_paragraph: It was nighttime in May of 1990, in the heyday of the cocaine boom across America. Twenty Mexican federal police officers and a handful of U.S. Customs agents, acting on a tip, descended on a stucco home on the edge of Agua Prieta, Mexico — a stone's throw from Arizona. "Policia," they yelled, guns drawn, before busting down the front door.

headline.main: Chapo's Rise: From Poor, Abused to Cartel Kingpin
headline.print_headline: Chapo's Rise: From Poor, Abused to Cartel Kingpin

docs.snippet: Bollettieri, a coach of future champions at IMG Academy in Bradenton, Fla., is still building his legacy and is expected to be chosen for the International Tennis Hall of Fame....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bollettieri, a coach of future champions at IMG Academy in Bradenton, Fla., is still building his legacy and is expected to be chosen for the International Tennis Hall of Fame.
docs.abstract: Profile of 82-year-old tennis coach Nick Bollettieri, who is still active training future champions at the IMG Academy in Bradenton, Fla; Bollettieri is widely expected to be announced as an inductee into the Tennis Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Nick Bollettieri’s Age: 82. His Vision for Tennis Talent: 20/20.
